name: Impulse (itch) (TheHumbleGamer, Phinnick, DubstepDragon, vectordragon)
description:
When a wizard named Dee loses a bar game, Dee becomes tiny! Dee must traverse the tavern tabletops to get back to their bag of holding to gather the components necessary to cast a spell to return to normal. Impulse consists of a series of challenging obstacle courses and whimsical music in this mental game of movement.

How to play: A number-based input game. Use your numpad to boost the dice wizard in the direction opposite of the matching side of the die. (e.g. if 3 is on the left side of the die, 3 will move the wizard right).
